about.details:
Creative Graphics Solutions India Limited was founded in 2014 and manufactures flexographic printing plates. The company was previously known as Tanushii Industries Private Limited.

The company manufactures Digital Flexo Plates, Conventional Flexo Printing Plates, Letter Press Plates, Metal Back Plates, and Coating Plates. The company also has two wholly owned subsidiaries: Creative Graphics Premedia Private Limited and Wahren India Private Limited.

Creative Graphics Premedia Pvt Ltd offers premedia services such as design customization and print production. Its clients include ITC, TATA Consumers, MARS, Cavin Kare, Haldiram, Dabur India, KRBL, Himalaya, Hamdard Laboratories etc.

Wahren India Pvt Ltd offers packaging solutions for the pharmaceutical industry such as Alu-Alu Foil, Blister Foil, Tropical Alu-Alu Foil, CR Foil, and Pharmaceutical Sachet.

Creative Graphics Solutions India has 7 manufacturing facilities in Noida, Uttar Pradesh, Vasai, Mumbai, Chennai, Bmaddi Himachal Pradesh, Hyderabad, Ahmedabad and Pune.

The company's customers come from all over India and from countries such as Africa, Thailand, Qatar, Kuwait and Nepal.

As of March 2024, the company has over 400 employees.

faqs.question: What is the Creative Graphics Solutions India IPO?
faqs.answer:
Creative Graphics Solutions India IPO is a SME IPO of 6400000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹54.40 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹85 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on March 28, 2024, and closes on April 4, 2024.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Creative Graphics Solutions India IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Creative Graphics Solutions India IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Creative Graphics Solutions India IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Creative Graphics Solutions India IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Creative Graphics Solutions India IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Creative Graphics Solutions India IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Creative Graphics Solutions India IPO opens on March 28, 2024 and closes on April 4, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Creative Graphics Solutions India IPO?
faqs.answer: Creative Graphics Solutions India IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,36,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Creative Graphics Solutions India IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Creative Graphics Solutions India IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Creative Graphics Solutions India IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Creative Graphics Solutions India IPO will be done on Friday, April 5, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, April 8, 2024. Check the Creative Graphics Solutions India IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Creative Graphics Solutions India IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Creative Graphics Solutions India IPO listing date is on Tuesday, April 9, 2024.
